reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: FLC: Nahdet El Mahrousa/Capacity Building and Opportunity Matching of Women in Greater Cairo and Minya

description.narrative: The project aims to enable underserved women to access economic opportunities and participate in the workforce. It will target 185 women in Minya and Greater Cairo of various educational backgrounds who have limited skills and capacity and/or lack access t o suitable opportunities.The project will achieve its objectives through 6 main activities: 1) mapping opportunities categorized as waged gig and self-employment 2) reaching out and selecting the beneficiaries 3) conducting career counselling and baseline for beneficiaries to understand their interests and needs 4) matching women from Minya and Greater Cairo with income generating opportunities 5) building their capacities to enable them to participate in the labor force and 6) finalizing placement and foll owing up with the women after they get placed in jobs or start their own projects. It is important to note that this is an ongoing process and the activities may be repeated throughout the duration of the project.The project aims to help empower women thro ugh the way the project is implemented as much as through the outcomes. During career counselling the women with the help of the counsellors will have the choice to pick between the three employment tracks as well as sector. Accordingly the trainings will be customized to suit the women?s choices.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

tag.narrative: Generating jobs, livelihood opportunities and well-being in a developing country is the main prio rity area in this activity
Strengthening of the rights and status of women and girls is a secondary priority area in this activity
